title-group.article-title: A Longitudinal Slip Tire Model for Brake Control Systems: Features and Uses in Simulation, Control Synthesis and Stability Analysis

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2003 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: A dynamical model of tire longitudinal slip, suitable for use in aircraft brake control system and antiskid design, is presented. The model differs from conventional muslip models in that it incorporates a single degree of freedom for tire stretch. Applications of the model in simulation, control synthesis, and stability analyses are described.
